title: Did Trump play sports at military school? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the New York Military Academy yearbook he was a member of the varsity soccer, baseball, and football teams. He arrived at the school in upstate Cornwall, New York, in 1959. He graduated in 1964. An article about him during his school years at the Academy https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/decades-later-disagreement-over-young-trumps-military-academy-post/2016/01/09/907a67b2-b3e0-11e5-a842-0feb51d1d124_story.html Trump in the forefront:  This Is Where Donald Trump Played By The Rules And Learned To Beat The Game
